# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.PCLMULQDQ property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

PCLMULQDQ. A value of true indicates the processor supports PCLMULQDQ instruction.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: PCLMULQDQ
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean

```csharp
public static IPropertyKey PCLMULQDQ { get; }
```
